tables:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS audit (
  trip_id text,
  ordernumber text,
  rate text,
  status text NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending'::text,
  startdate date,
  end_date date,
  cost_centre text,
  origin text,
  destination text,
  cargo text,
  cargo_weight text,
  notes text,
  drivers jsonb,
  vehicles jsonb,
  vehicle_assignments jsonb,
  pickup_locations jsonb,
  dropoff_locations jsonb,
  waypoints jsonb,
  selected_stop_points jsonb,
  stop_points jsonb,
  selected_client text,
  client_details jsonb,
  status_notes text,
  route text,
  driver text,
  vehicle text,
  distance text,
  costcentre jsonb,
  enddate text,
  cargoweight text,
  vehicleassignments jsonb DEFAULT '[]'::jsonb,
  pickuplocations jsonb DEFAULT '[]'::jsonb,
  dropofflocations jsonb DEFAULT '[]'::jsonb,
  selectedstoppoints jsonb DEFAULT '[]'::jsonb,
  stoppoints jsonb DEFAULT '[]'::jsonb,
  selectedclient text,
  clientdetails jsonb DEFAULT '{"name": "", "email": "", "phone": "", "address": "", "contactPerson": ""}'::jsonb,
  statusnotes text,
  created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now(),
  updated_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT now(),
  id bigint NOT NULL,
  status_history _text,
  load_inspection_id bigint,
  actual_start timestamp with time zone,
  actual_end_time timestamp with time zone,
  time_diff numeric,
  actual_fuel_cost numeric,
  actual_vehicle_cost numeric,
  actual_driver_cost numeric,
  actual_total_cost numeric,
  actual_cpk numeric,
  actual_distance numeric,
  fuel_price_used numeric,
  trip_days_actual numeric,
  vehicle_type text,
  driver_hourly_rate numeric,
  cost_variance numeric,
  profit_margin_actual numeric,
  planned_start_time timestamp with time zone,
  planned_finish_time timestamp with time zone,
  planned_distance numeric,
  planned_duration_minutes integer,
  planned_driving_time_minutes integer,
  actual_start_time timestamp with time zone,
  actual_finish_time timestamp with time zone,
  actual_duration_minutes integer,
  actual_driving_time_minutes integer,
  start_time_variance_minutes integer,
  finish_time_variance_minutes integer,
  distance_variance numeric,
  duration_variance_minutes integer,
  driving_time_variance_minutes integer,
  planned_fuel_cost numeric,
  planned_vehicle_cost numeric,
  planned_driver_cost numeric,
  planned_total_cost numeric,
  route_points jsonb
);

  night_driving_earned integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  total_points_earned integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,

  kilometers_cap double precision DEFAULT 20.0,
  kilometers_earned integer DEFAULT 0
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS eps_daily_performance (
  id bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('eps_daily_performance_id_seq'::regclass),
  plate varchar(20) NOT NULL,
  driver_name varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  date date NOT NULL,
  latest_speed integer DEFAULT 0,
  latest_latitude numeric,
  latest_longitude numeric,
  latest_loc_time timestamp without time zone NOT NULL,
  latest_mileage integer DEFAULT 0,
  latest_geozone varchar(255),
  latest_address text,
  speed_compliance boolean DEFAULT true,
  route_compliance boolean DEFAULT true,
  time_compliance boolean DEFAULT true,
  efficiency numeric DEFAULT 0.0,
  safety_score numeric DEFAULT 1.0,
  total_points integer DEFAULT 0,
  reward_level varchar(20) DEFAULT 'Gold'::character varying,
  total_updates_count integer DEFAULT 1,
  last_update_time timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  total_risk_score numeric DEFAULT 0.0,
  risk_level varchar(20) DEFAULT 'Gold'::character varying
);
